DOC.brief_summary: The purpose pilot study evaluate , mean specific cognitive test battery ( Brief Repeatable Battery Delis-Kaplan Executive Function System scale ) , slowing/reduction cognitive dysfunction progression RRMS patient 18 month treatment fingolimod comparison interferon beta 1b treatment , evaluate test battery sensitive detecting difference treatment group .
DOC.brief_title: Fingolimod Versus Interferon Beta 1b Cognitive Symptoms
DOC.criteria: Patients relapsingremitting form MS define 2005 revise McDonald criterion . Patients active disease , define least one clinical relapse last year , two clinical relapse last two year sign disease activity one brain MRI scan perform last six month . Patients cognitive impairment screening , define least one test Rao 's Brief Repeatable Battery score fall outside 90th percentile normative data . Patients already treat multiweekly interferon ( interferon beta 1b , beta 1a multiweekly ) unsatisfactory response accord judgment investigator . Patients hyperactive form MS disease accord judgment investigator . Patients EDSS score high 5 . Patients prior current diagnosis Major Depression accord DSMIV . Patients history chronic disease immune system MS know immunodeficiency syndrome . Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
